code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Register(){const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState(null);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch('/register',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({username,password})});const data=await response.json();if(data.success){window.location.href=data.redirect;}else{setError(data.message);}}catch(error){setError('Registeration failed.
